projectGridLines.stationName: ZF India Technology Center - AI Developer
projectGridLines.title: AI Developer
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Primarily focused on developing AI solutions for road condition monitoring.

Develop algorithms to evaluate the severity of road conditions and preprocess data by

performing tasks like annotation.

Skill sets: Python, OOPS, PyTorch ,Deep learning, Machine learning, Azure, Data analysis and

finding insights, Annotate and preprocess data.

Traits expectation: Improved skills in data preprocessing, model development. Familiarity

with machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch. Good debugging skills, ability

to cover edge cases.

Expected learning: AI Algorithms Development, ML(SVM, KNN,DT) & DL models (CNN,

LSTM, RNN) and Transformers.

Specific courses required for project execution: Data structure & algorithms, Basics of

Cloud(Azure), Artificial Intelligence, Software engineering, Distributed computing

(optional).
